page.title: 04BUSINESS-CATTERICK-TUNSTALL
page.content: Between Catterick and Tunstall there are three public houses, an art gallery, a second-hand book shop, a retail oil business, a caravan site, a post office with general store, one clothes store, a horse and carriage hire service and a vehicle repair workshop. The public houses are well supported by locals and visitors. The art gallery, bookshop and caravan site rely mainly on summer tade. The post office with general store, the clothing store and retail oil business enjoy trade all the year round. The sludge tanker serves homes not connected to the main sewerage system, the vehicle repair workshop is patronized by locals and visitors and the horse and carriage is a familiar sight at weddings and social occasions
